entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Suffield
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:38 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ralston 11:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: -9.9°C
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -11.1°C
Wind: E 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow at times heavy beginning this evening. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm except 5 cm near the Saskatchewan border. Wind becoming northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 late this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow early in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023
